snippet: The retirements of Lewis Booth, the company’s chief financial officer, and Derrick Kuzak, Ford’s global product chief, had been expected, but could test the depth of the company’s management team.
abstract: Ford Motor Company announces the retirements of Lewis Booth, the company's chief financial officer, and Derrick M Kuzak, Ford's global product chief; Booth will be succeeded by Robert L Shanks and Kuzak's replacement will be Raj Nair, both internal promotions.
lead_paragraph: The retirements of Lewis Booth, the company’s chief financial officer, and Derrick Kuzak, Ford’s global product chief, had been expected, but could test the depth of the company’s management team.

headline.seo: Two Top Executives at Ford to Retire Ford Executives Lewis Booth and Derrick Kuzak Retire
headline.main: 2 Executives at Ford to Retire; Inside Successors Named
headline.print_headline: 2 Executives at Ford to Retire; Inside Successors Named
